author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a daring incident, a robber, who entered the house of a trader in Tirunelveli Town on Wednesday night, attacked his mother with an iron rod and snatched her gold chain, worth about Rs. 5.25 lakh.

Police said an unidentified robber, who entered the house of S. Ananthavel of Amman Sannidhi Street in Tirunelveli Town through the door that was open in the first floor on Wednesday night tried to snatch the gold chain of Ananthavel’s mother Mookkammal (58), who was alone in another room.

When she woke up from sleep and started fighting with the robber, he attacked her with an iron rod and escaped with her gold chain, weighing 21 sovereigns, through the same door he entered the house.

As Mr. Ananthavel and his family members rushed to the help of Ms. Mookkammal, they found the old woman lying in a pool of blood as she had sustained grievous head injury in the attack.

She has been admitted to a private hospital and her condition was reportedly “stable.”

Fingerprint experts have lifted vital clues from the scene of crime. Based on the complaint from Mr. Ananthavel, the Tirunelveli Town police have registered a case.
title: Woman robbed of 21-sovereign chain
